comprehensive_overview: pyGenomeTracks is a Python package for plotting high quality and highly customizable visualizations of genomic data. It allows users to create complex, publication-ready figures to explore and represent genomics data effectively.
core_features: Creation of customizable and high-quality genomic data visualizations
Support for various types of genomics data, including gene annotations, ChIP-seq peaks, and interaction matrices
Highly configurable layout options for precise control over track placement, sizing, and styling
Integration with popular genomics data formats such as BED, BAM, BigWig, and VCF files
Ability to add custom tracks, labels, legends, and annotations to the plots
Interactive plotting capabilities for zooming, panning, and exploring genomic regions
